<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 20px; flex-wrap: wrap;">

On **September 15, 2023**, I had the incredible opportunity to address over **600 budding engineers** at Matrusri Engineering College’s induction program.  
I spoke about:
- The multifaceted world of engineering
- Mental health and emotional intelligence
- The power of mindfulness in boosting creativity and decision-making  

A truly memorable experience inspiring the next generation of engineers!

### 🎓 Career Growth Webinar with Ravi Ganti

<div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 20px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
  <img src="images/career/ravi_ganti_webinar_1.jpg" alt="Ravi Ganti Webinar 1" width="300px">
  <img src="images/career/ravi_ganti_webinar_2.jpg" alt="Ravi Ganti Webinar 2" width="300px">
</div>

On **February 20, 2024**, I helped organize a transformative webinar featuring insights from **Ravi Ganti** on career growth.  
Key takeaways:
- Build a career around what excites you.
- Adopt a growth mindset and adaptability.
- Leverage AI tools as powerful allies for productivity, not as competition.

A truly inspiring session that reshaped how I think about professional growth!

### 🏥 Building MOM (My Own Medic) at George Hacks 2025

<div style="text-align: center;">
  <img src="images/career/george_hacks.jpg" alt="My Own Medic Project" width="300px">
</div>

During the **George Hacks Hackathon** on **March 2, 2025**, our team built **MOM (My Own Medic)** — a personalized AI healthcare assistant that integrates securely with Electronic Health Records (EHRs) for real-time, proactive health insights.

**Tech Stack:**  
`TensorFlow • GPT-4 • FastAPI • MongoDB • React.js • FHIR APIs • OAuth 2.0`

It was an amazing learning experience working on HIPAA-compliant AI applications!

[🔗 View on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/tarun-kumanduri_georgehacks-hackathon-healthcareai-activity-7304237214249406464-JzT8)

On **April 25, 2025**, I presented two co-authored research projects at the **GW SEAS R&D Showcase**:

- **Resilient Megacities**: Adaptive strategies for urban resilience in a changing climate.

A fantastic opportunity to share our team's work with a broader academic audience!
